00013 public class ArrayBoard extends AbstractBoard{
00014 
00015         
00016         public static Board getInstance() {
00017                 return new ArrayBoard();
00018         }
00019 
00020         private Cell [][] cellMatrix;
00021         
00022         private int xSize;
00023         
00024         private int ySize;
00025         
00029         private ArrayBoard(){
00030         }
00031         
00032         public Board initializeFromSize(int xSize, int ySize){
00033                 //Logger.logLine(Logger.DEBUG, "Initializing new board of size " + xSize + "," + ySize);
00034                 this.xSize = xSize;
00035                 this.ySize = ySize;
00036                 
00037                 cellMatrix = new Cell[xSize][ySize];
00038                 
00039                 for(int x = 0; x < xSize; x++){
00040                         for(int y = 0; y < ySize; y++){
00041                                 cellMatrix[x][y] = new Cell(x, y);
00042                         }
00043                 }
00044                 
00045                 //add all neighbours for all cells              
00046                 for(int x = 0; x < xSize; x++){
00047                         for(int y = 0; y < ySize; y++){         
00048                                 for(int i = x-1; i <= x+1; i++){
00049                                         for(int j = y-1; j <= y+1; j++){
00050                                                 if(i == x && j==y) continue;
00051                                                 if( i < 0 || j < 0 ||
00052                                                         i >= xSize || j >= ySize) continue;
00053                                                 //Logger.logLine("Neighbour of [" + x + ',' + y + ']' + '[' + i + ',' + j + ']');
00054                                                 cellMatrix[x][y].addNeighbour(cellMatrix[i][j]);
00055                                         }
00056                                 }
00057                         }
00058                 }
00059                 return this;
00060         
00061         }
00062         
00063         public int getXSize() {
00064                 return xSize;
00065         }
00066 
00067         public int getYSize() {
00068                 return ySize;
00069         }
00070         
00071         public Cell getCell(int x, int y){
00072                 if(x >= xSize || y >= ySize) return null;
00073                 return cellMatrix[x][y];
00074         }
00082         @Override
00083         public Board copyStateFrom(List<String> dataList){
00084                 for(int y = 0; y<ySize && y<dataList.size(); y++){
00085                         String row = dataList.get(y);
00086                         String [] rowElements = row.split(IConstants.SEPARATOR);
00087                         for(int x = 0; x<xSize && x<rowElements.length; x++){
00088                                 if(rowElements[x].equals(IConstants.ALIVE_CHAR)){
00089                                         cellMatrix[x][y].setState(true);
00090                                 }
00091                         }
00092                 }
00093                 return this;
00094         }
00095         
00102         public Board copyStateFrom(Board board){
00103                 //The prev generation board is 2 sizes smaller
00104                 for(int i = 0; i < xSize-2; i++){
00105                         for(int j = 0; j < ySize-2; j++){
00106                                 if(board.getCell(i, j).getState()){
00107                                         cellMatrix[i+1][j+1].setState(true);
00108                                 }
00109                         }
00110                 }
00111                 return this;
00112         }
00113         
00114         public String display(){
00115                 StringBuffer result = new StringBuffer();
00116                 
00117                 for(int y = 0; y < ySize; y++){
00118                         StringBuffer line = new StringBuffer();
00119                         for(int x = 0; x < xSize; x++){
00120                                 if(cellMatrix[x][y].isAlive()){
00121                                         line.append(IConstants.ALIVE_CHAR).append(' ');
00122                                         Logger.log(Logger.DEBUG, IConstants.ALIVE_CHAR + " ");
00123                                 } else {
00124                                         line.append(IConstants.DEAD_CHAR).append(' ');
00125                                         Logger.log(Logger.DEBUG, IConstants.DEAD_CHAR + " ");
00126                                 }
00127                         }
00128                         Logger.log(Logger.DEBUG, "\n");
00129                         result.append(line.toString()).append("\n");
00130                 }
00131                 
00132                 return result.toString();
00133         }
